data.name: Something Awful Dark Theme
Twitch Clear Reruns
data.description: Make it very clear when a stream is a rerun

data.name: Sep7agon nuisance remover
Chess.com Board: Grey Wooden Chess Board
data.description: Chess.com Board: Grey Wooden Chess Board by Mad_Amateur
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("chess.com") {
div[class^="daily-puzzle-board"],
div[class^="game-preview"],
div[class^="board chessboard-component"],
div[class^="board v-board chessboard-component"],
div[class^="board rounded"],
div[class^="board rounded fippled"],
div[class^="board fippled rounded"],
div[class^="board v-board rounded"],
div[class^="board v-board fippled rounded"],
div[class^="board disabled rounded"],
div[id$="_ChessBoard_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_openingboard_1"],
div[id^="board_training"],
div[id^="divBoard_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_tactics_board"],
div[id^="chessboard_"],
div[id*="chessboard_"],
div[id^="chess_com_chessmentorboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_chessmentorboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_chessmentor_board_1_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_emailboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_emailboard_"] {background-image: url("https://i.imgur.com/6ErJXSW.jpg")!important;}
}

data.name: Cosmic Panda 2020 Paronámico en Español.
data.description:
¡¡¡SOLO FUNCIONA CON EL VIEJO DISEÑO DE YOUTUBE!!!
PARA RESOLUCIÓN PARONÁMICA PARA LA VERSIÓN 4:3/5:4, CLIQUE AQUÍ:
https://userstyles.org/styles/185784/cosmic-panda-2020-4-3-5-4-en-espa-ol

El diseño Cosmic Panda del YouTube 2011-2012 ¡ahora en tu YouTube!
Revive y siente nostalgia por la época dorada de YouTube
Recomiendo que instales estos temas también para tener una mejor experiencia:
https://userstyles.org/styles/162809/youtube-s-2011-2012-html-5-player
https://userstyles.org/styles/167326/youtube-2012-2013-subscribe-button

(Tenerlo en cuenta: este tema fue creado utilizando este tema: https://userstyles.org/styles/179642/youtube-project-2012-legacy como base, a partir de ahí fui añadiendo nuevas cosas y arreglando otras cuantas)

data.name: Urshifu Sprite & Mini-Sprite
data.description: Adds an in-battle sprite and team sprite for both new Urshifu formes (the same sprite) so you can stop losing to an invisible square!

data.name: Skyscraper City Hide Autogenerated Avatars
data.description: Hides confusing "default avatars" which are assigned to people who haven't specified any.
